item.title: News24.com | Russia launching 'powerful assault' on Azovstal plant - Ukraine military
item.description: The Ukrainian military said on Tuesday that Russian forces had launched an offensive on the besieged Azovstal steel plant where Kyiv's forces are holed up in the southern city of Mariupol.

item.title: News24.com | Finland state power company takes R35bn Russia hit
item.description: Finnish state-owned utility Fortum said Tuesday it would take a 2.1-billion-euro (R35bn) hit due to "geopolitical tensions and uncertainties" linked to its Russian operations.

item.title: News24.com | Mystery liver disease kills three children in Indonesia
item.description: Three children in Indonesia have died from a mysterious liver disease, the country's health ministry said, raising to at least four the global death toll of a fatal ailment puzzling doctors from the US to Asia.

item.title: Businessinsider.co.za | The SEC doubles crypto enforcement unit as it sees retail investors 'bearing the brunt of abuses'
item.description: The Wall Street regulator said it would add 20 positions to its Crypto Assets and Cyber Unit, bringing it to a total of 50.

item.title: Businessinsider.co.za | Supreme Court confirms the authenticity of leaked draft opinion gutting abortion rights
item.description: The court noted that the draft "does not represent a decision by the Court or the final position of any member on the issues in the case."

item.title: Businessinsider.co.za | The EU is planning to turn to Africa to help wean itself off Russian natural gas, a report says
item.description: Europe is accelerating efforts to reduce its reliance on Russia, from where it sources about 40% of its natural gas demand.

item.title: News24.com | WATCH | War in Ukraine: watch all the latest videos as the conflict escalates
News24.com | US Supreme Court's potential shock move on abortion sends protesters onto streets
item.description: Anti-abortion activists and pro-abortion rights supporters took to the streets of Washington on Tuesday after news that the US Supreme Court may overturn the 1973 Roe v. Wade ruling that legalised abortion.

item.title: Businessinsider.co.za | Undermining of abortion rights is rare, 'goes hand-in-hand with creeping authoritarianism' - experts
item.description: Only a few countries have eroded existing abortion access laws in the 21st century. The United States is one of them.

item.title: Businessinsider.co.za | UN official says millions of tons of grain are blocked at Ukraine's ports due to Russia's invasion
item.description: Almost 4.5 million tons of grain are held up with ports and sea routes deemed unsafe, the UN World Food Programme said.

item.title: News24.com | 'Do something Democrats' - abortion rights supporters chant at US Supreme Court
item.description: Hundreds of abortion rights supporters have gathered in anger at the US Supreme Court after an unprecedented leak showed a majority of justices poised to overturn the Roe v Wade decision that legalised abortion nationwide.

item.title: Businessinsider.co.za | John Deere dealership remotely locks R80m worth of farm vehicles, that were stolen by Russian troops
item.description: "When the invaders drove the stolen harvesters to Chechnya, they realised that they could not even turn them on, because the harvesters were locked remotely," a source told CNN.

item.title: News24.com | Russia steps up Ukraine fight as more Mariupol evacuations expected
item.description: Fighting raged in the critical port city of Odessa and across Ukraine's east as fresh evacuations of civilians from war-ravaged Mariupol were set to take place on Tuesday.

item.title: News24.com | Israel demands apology after Russia says Hitler had Jewish roots
item.description: Israel has lambasted Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov for claiming Adolf Hitler had Jewish origins, saying it was an 'unforgivable' falsehood that debased the horrors of the Nazi Holocaust.

item.title: News24.com | EXPLAINER | Abortion rights: US Supreme Court's Roe v Wade decision hinged on women's right to privacy
item.description: A leaked initial draft majority opinion suggests the US Supreme Court will vote to overturn the Roe v Wade decision that legalised abortion nationwide, Politico has reported.

item.title: Businessinsider.co.za | Millions of bees being transported on a US flight died in extreme heat after being left on the tarmac
item.description: The $48,000 shipment carrying 800 pounds of bees was forced to travel to Atlanta when they wouldn't fit on a Seattle-bound flight.

item.title: Businessinsider.co.za | Mariupol steel plant evacuee said she hasn't seen sunlight in 2 months, as first 100 people evacuated
item.description: A group of about 100 people was evacuated from the Azovstal steel plant in Mariupol on Sunday after sheltering for two months.

item.title: News24.com | Leaked draft shows US court set to strike down abortion rights: Politico
item.description: The Supreme Court is poised to strike down the right to abortion in the United States, according to a leaked draft of a majority opinion that would shred nearly 50 years of constitutional protections.

item.title: News24.com | Ex-New York cop found guilty of assaulting police during US Capitol riot
item.description: A former New York City police officer was found guilty on Monday of assaulting a Washington, DC, police officer during the 6 January 2021, riot at the US Capitol by supporters of then-President Donald Trump.

item.title: Businessinsider.co.za | Russia is stealing farm equipment and destroying grain silos to cause a famine, Ukraine says
item.description: Ukrainian officials previously accused Russia of stealing grain in areas that President Vladimir Putin's forces now occupy.
